pages.text: Runed obsidian is a hardier form of $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$() created with a $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), adding the hardness & blast resistance of obsidian.$(br2)It can be used for the construction of $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stones$() as well as $(l:crafting/runed_obsidian)decoratively$().$(br2)$(info) In addition, runed obsidian is immune to Withers and most bosses.
